Package com.perforce.p4java.impl.mapbased.rpc.stream

Interface Summary
RpcSocketPool.ShutdownHandler Shutdown handler for cleaning up before a socket is closed
 

Class Summary
RpcGZIPInputStream A lightweight wrapper around the JZlib GZIP input stream for processing compressed streams being sent from Perforce servers when the client "client compress" mode is enabled.
RpcGZIPOutputStream A fairly lightweight filter output stream that implements Perforce's GZIP-based connection stream compression for Perforce clients that have the Perforce "client compression" option set.
RpcSocketInputStream Implements the lowest level of the P4Java RPC input socket stream architecture.
RpcSocketOutputStream Implements the lowest level of the P4Java RPC output stream architecture.
RpcSocketPool  
RpcSSLSocketFactory A factory for creating SSL socket objects.
RpcSSLSocketFactory.TrustAllTrustManager This class allow any X509 certificates to be used to authenticate the remote side of a secure socket, including self-signed certificates.
RpcStreamConnection Socket stream I/O based implementation of the RpcConnection class.
